title: Carousel Pattern
excerpt: Showcasing multiple items in a limited space.
content:
The carousel pattern, also known as a slider, is a way to display multiple pieces of content in a single, compact area. It allows users to browse through a series of items, images, or cards.

Use Cases

  • Showcasing featured products or content
  • Displaying image galleries
  • Presenting testimonials or reviews

Best Practices

  1. Provide clear navigation controls
  2. Use auto-rotation cautiously
  3. Ensure mobile responsiveness
  4. Optimize for performance
  5. Make it accessible for all users
